markdown:
Naiads protect streams, ponds, springs, and other natural bodies of fresh water. While most naiads lead solitary lives close to their chosen home, sometimes they congregate in coven-like groups where river tributaries meet, performing great magic and blessing the waters of the land. Because naiads' bonds to their bodies of water permit more flexibility, they are the nymphs most likely to interact with humanoids—and even visit their settlements on occasion. Unlike other nymphs, naiads occasionally become adventurers, especially when dark forces seek to despoil nature or otherwise threaten the land, joining forces with others to prevent the corruption of the natural world. **[Recall Knowledge - Fey](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)): DC 15 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10 [Naiad](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3111) **Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 244 1.1 **Perception** +6; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=69) **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Elven](/Languages.aspx?ID=4), [Fey](/Languages.aspx?ID=119), [Thalassic](/Languages.aspx?ID=113) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +6, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +3, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +7, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +6, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +6, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +4 **Str** +0 **Dex** +3 **Con** +0 **Int** +1 **Wis** +1 **Cha** +4 **Animal Empathy** The naiad can ask questions of, receive answers from, and use the [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=39) skill with [animals](/Traits.aspx?ID=531). --- **AC** 14 **Fort** +3 **Ref** +6 **Will** +8 **HP** 20 **Resistances** [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=604) 3 **Weaknesses** [cold iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2916) 3 **Water Dependent** A naiad is bonded to a spring, pond, or similar-sized water feature. If she is more than 300 feet away from it for 24 hours or more, she gains the [weak](/Rules.aspx?ID=791) adjustments until she returns. She can perform a 24-hour ritual to bond herself to a new body of water.
Water Healing (healing, primal, vitality) For every 10 minutes a naiad spends soaking in her bonded body of water, she regains 7 Hit Points. --- **Speed** 25 feet, swim 25 feet **Melee** aqueous fist +8 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Water](/Traits.aspx?ID=165)), **Damage** 1d8 bludgeoning **Ranged** water orb +8 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [range 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [Water](/Traits.aspx?ID=165)), **Damage** 1d6 bludgeoning **Primal Innate Spells** DC 17 - **1st** [Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34), [Create Water](/Spells.aspx?ID=53), [Hydraulic Push](/Spells.aspx?ID=154), [Tidal Surge](/Spells.aspx?ID=458) (at will)
name: Naiad
